name: Cellular Wasteland
description:
This is a simple RTS(Real-time strategy) game about the cells will need to gather resources to build up an army, to kill off and destroy the hostile units and base.

This game is released for the Godot Wild Jam #36 - Our third year! The theme is Uncontrollable Growth and no wildcard is used in this game.

During the gameplay, be sure to look into the tips panel at the left bottom. By the way, you can hover your mouse cursor on these panels to see more information, LMB to create your units and RMB to cancel the build queue one-by-one at the right side.

Additionally, in your screen, you click LMB and drag it to form a selection box to select your units, and order the move command to the said position by clicking RMB. Your unit will automatically attack enemies on sight when it just stopped moving.
(I will update the game when I fixed some issues commented by some players, the stats balancing will be tweaked as well)
